title: Lag spikes every game
body: What is going on? For some reason the past two days my ping has been constantly going up and down every few seconds and it's making it extremely difficult to play. It's not my internet because that's working completely fine. I also just tried reinstalling the game. I usually sit at a smooth 40ms. Can anyone help?

replies.body: Bumping because this is still going on and it has not been addressed.

> [{quoted}](name=porcha,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u7EM8TP0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-05T23:37:00.480+0000)
>
> is it your fps?

No this is my ping (ms)

> [{quoted}](name=Bmar,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u7EM8TP0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-05T23:38:58.685+0000)
>
> No this is my ping (ms)

ahh..
bcus my fps keeps going to 120 to 12 then back to 120 then back to 12

Inconsistent latency (ping) or latency spikes are typically caused by a poor connection to our servers. When discussing issues with latency, it's important to note that each service or game you access online resides in a different geolocation, meaning you could have issues to one, but not another. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if these steps resolved the issue.
